introduction.html:div: A subproject of Gemini that provides a modular implementation of JPA.

release_deliverables.html:div: A set of bundles that should be added to a subset of the EclipseLink JPA provider bundles.

preamble.html:div: A set of milestones will provide the functionality before the actual release.

postamble.html:div: The project is expected to graduate from incubation at approximately the same time as the 1.0.0 release.

target_environments.html:div: Gemini JPA 1.0 is targeted to run in any standard OSGi framework environment.

internationalization.html:div: No internationalization is planned for the release.

compatibility_with_previous_releases.html:div: No previous releases exist, but applications that reference the javax.persistence.Persistence class will continue to function correctly.

preamble.html:div: The following themes and priorities were considered during Gemini JPA development.

theme.name: OSGi and Java EE development
theme.description: Developers that are using Java EE technologies in an OSGi environment

theme.name: Compliance
theme.description: To remain compliant with both the JPA and the OSGi JPA specifications
